definitions: a person who makes models of people or things

examples.text: among the photographs there are a couple of particular interest to the modeler
he is a keen ship modeler
Sheppard was a sensitive and subtle modeler in clay

definitions: a person who devises or uses a simplified description, especially a mathematical one, of a system or process to assist calculations and predictions

examples.text: a climate modeler is interested in modeling the interactions between the atmosphere, the ocean, and ice sheets
he describes himself as a data modeler

shortDefinitions: person who devises representation of system
